Forwarding this message just in case anyone's interested in helping get RK back onto the program schedule of Cartoon Network.  They've cut it up so badly, I'd like to see them just put it back into the primetime Toonami schedule (which is how I first started watching it).
 
phil
To: rurouni-love@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tue, 13 Apr 2004 21:13:49 -0000
Subject: [rurouni-love] Bad news....

If you haven't heard already, RK has been taken off Cartoon
Network!!!!!!

I don't know how many of you watch it on Cartoon Network, but I know
a few people who do.

Please help us by contacting the network and telling them that we
don't want them to take Kenshin away!!!!

Contact them by filling out the feedback form on this webpage!!!!

http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/gen/help/index.html

Please help us who watch it on cartoon network!!!
